elements.label: End
elements.description: An intention, a destination, a purpose, a goal.
elements.comments: As long as a card with this aspect is in the Work Verb, it's not possible to perform any of the normal ritual recipes: summoning, Forge's Redemption, Reason's Glory, Passion's Gyre, or The End is Beautiful.
As long as a card with this aspect is in the Verb, it's not possible to perform any of the normal crafted recipes that have been modified by AchInt.
Disables the "I don't think we have anything to say" hint as long as it's in the Verb.
When in the Work Verb, prevents the work.generaldesire.hint recipe from activating as a hint.
When in a Verb, prevents any hint with a comment saying that the hint cannot appear due to restrictions on the main Verb.
When in a Verb, prevents vault-starting hints from happening.
